name: 玄德
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><preparingStage></preparingStage></tickingLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><you></you></drawer><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable"><equaling><equalingHead0></equalingHead0><lostHealth epithet='1'></lostHealth epithet='1'>一半(<roundUp><roundUp0></roundUp0></roundUp>)</equaling>的</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>。

role.lore: 濬哲文明，溫恭允塞，玄德升聞

name: 允中
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><actingStage></actingStage></tickingLimit><numberLimit class="irreplaceable"><numberLimiting><numberLimitingHead></numberLimitingHead>一<numberLimitingEnd></numberLimitingEnd></numberLimiting></numberLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><can><canHead></canHead><or><make><makeHead></makeHead><discard><discardRole class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最多的<roleDefault></roleDefault></discardRole><each><eachHead></eachHead><discardBody1></discardBody1><discardedCard class="irreplaceable"><choose><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable">一张</targetNumberLimit><cardDefault></cardDefault></choose></discardedCard></discard></each></make><orBody></orBody><make><makeHead></makeHead><draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最少的<roleDefault></roleDefault></drawer><each><eachHead></eachHead><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable">一张</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></each></make></or></can>。

name: 鸿志
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickLimit class="irreplaceable"><when><whenHead></whenHead><tickQuantifier>一名</tickQuantifier><role></role><whenEnteringDying></whenEnteringDying></when></tickLimit></procedureTrigger>，<draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><you></you></drawer><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable">两张</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>；<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickLimit class="irreplaceable"><when><whenHead></whenHead><tickQuantifier>一名</tickQuantifier><role></role><whenDie></whenDie></when></tickLimit></procedureTrigger>，<draw><drawer class="irreplaceable"><you></you></drawer><drawHead></drawHead><drawQuantity class="irreplaceable">一张</drawQuantity><drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>。

role.lore: 嗟乎，燕雀安知鴻鵠之志哉
狐鳴呼曰：「大楚興，陳勝王」

role.legend: 史記索隱·列傳述贊·孫子吳起列傳

name: 唯识
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickLimit class="irreplaceable"><beforeActingStageStart></beforeActingStageStart></tickLimit></procedureTrigger>，<comparison><comparisonInitiator class="irreplaceable"><you></you></comparisonInitiator><can><canHead></canHead><to><toHead1></toHead1><comparisonTarget class="irreplaceable"><anyNumber></anyNumber>名<elseRole></elseRole></comparisonTarget><comparisonEnd></comparisonEnd></to></comparison></can>，<if><ifHead></ifHead><you></you><winComparison></winComparison>，<use><user class="irreplaceable"><compareRole></compareRole></user><each><eachHead></eachHead><can><canHead></canHead><useBody></useBody><usedCard class="irreplaceable"><choose><targetLimit class="irreplaceable">一张<comparedCard></comparedCard></targetLimit></choose></usedCard></can></each></use></if>。若如此做，此回合<you></you>的点数大于最大负点的<handCard></handCard>的<affect><effect></effect></affect>视为【普度众生】。

role.lore: 稽首唯識性，滿分清淨者
